title: Wednesday’s Digest: A New Christmas Cruise, and Other Resort News
text:
Our weekday morning digest that includes information about cruises, resorts and theme parks, with deals, tips and anything else that travelers may want to know.
CHRISTMAS MARKET CRUISES
Christmas market cruises are popular itineraries on river ships in Europe. Now the Mississippi-plying American Queen Steamboat Company has added its own version of the winter itineraries, stopping at newly established Christmas markets in Greenville, Miss., and Nottoway, La. The 436-passenger paddle wheeler American Queen will offer five nine-day cruises on the Mississippi River between Memphis and New Orleans beginning Nov. 21 and concluding Dec. 20. Two ports will stage Christmas markets, featuring music, seasonal food and locally made crafts, and several others will offer such events as caroling and departure serenades. Passengers on the Dec. 12 cruise will be invited to a Christmas Ball at the Nottoway Plantation.
